revised_title: Vibrations of Free Plates: Line Symmetry and Corresponding Modes
tldr: The article explores the normal modes of vibration of plates with line symmetry and their corresponding classes. It demonstrates how the number of lines of symmetry is related to the number of classes and how the modes of vibration of one plate correspond with those of another. The study also highlights the importance of line and rotational symmetry in plate vibrations and the use of antinodal point patterns alongside nodal line patterns.
